website_summaries.verdict: Contemporary duo that comes in brass or silver.
pros: Weight and with a wider base helps prevents tipping

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty and excellent service
customer_reviews.text: These are substantial candlestick holders. They have lovely felt bottoms. They look like you spent much more money than you did. One of mine came slightly damaged due to Amazon packing. No fault of vendor. Seller immediately sent me a new candlestick. I give this company and A+++. I use these weekly and really love them. They look lovely at a set table or just set off as a pair on their own. With this company, I would not hesitate to recommend these
customer_reviews.author: jkm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 16th anniversary gift.
customer_reviews.text: I could not have asked for a better modern traditional gift for my wife for our 16th anniversary. These were better in person than in the description. These feel sturdy and well made. They have not fallen over.
customer_reviews.author: ppdjs725

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Addition to any Table!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to our celebratory dinner table! Beautiful & elegant ~ given as gift & the happy couple loved them ♥️ Needed these quick & they were shipped immediately- arrived before projected delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: The Dorn's

customer_reviews.title: Look nice
customer_reviews.text: They look nice, but quality control isn't the best. I noticed that the top flare-out is slightly bent to one side. Should be able to correct the appearance with angling the candle, but still a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the table
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Thanksgiving Dinner tablescape (yes, it's a word. accept it). A heavy weight, didn't topple. Looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Timo Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for silver candlesticks to add some dimension to my entryway table. These were a perfect fit, have a durable feel and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Smml

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Anywhere you put these they make a statement. I used them for our holiday table with mercury glass votives and everyone commented how beautiful they looked. They are good quality and nice height. You could use any size tapers in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just ordered two more
customer_reviews.text: Solid, heavy, gorgeous, classic, and fantastic value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: AstroGremlin

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: These candleholders are very attractive, very stable, and a great value for the money. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Silver? Yes and no.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, good weight, won't easily topple over with large candles. However, if you are purchasing these for the look of shiny silver find another set. These are less silver and more gunmetal gray. Not bad looking - just not the finish I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: JCD

customer_reviews.title: Good price good product!
customer_reviews.text: These look very high-end they're on my mantle and look absolutely beautiful. I would certainly tell a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good weight
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my daughter for Christmas and she loved them. The height, weight and color were perfect with the candles I gave her for her table.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Merriman

customer_reviews.title: They leave rings on the table if they get wet
customer_reviews.text: Loved these simply beautiful candle sticks until water was spilled on the table. When wet they left a green ring on the table that I can not get off.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Newcomer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These candlesticks are very classy and look like they cost much more than they did. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: octopus47

customer_reviews.title: Would have given it a 5 star review but they ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a 5 star review but they came with some noticeable scratches on the metal base of each holder that were deep. Some what disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Modern Candlesticks
customer_reviews.text: The product that I received was exactly what is shown in these images and described.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The candle holders are beautiful. I plan on buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Bartl

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality candle holders
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a housewarming gift for friends. Before we gift wrapped them, i inspected the holder -- nice quality and heavy. These won't tip over easily on your dinner table.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These candlesticks are beautiful! I have seen these exact ones on other sites for a lot more money. I will definitely purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These candlesticks are perfect for my dining room table
customer_reviews.text: These candlesticks are perfect for my dining room table. i have a chandelier in brushed nickel. The color and luster of these holders matches the chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely happy with the candle tapers
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with the candle tapers. They match the description perfectly and look just like the more expensive ones. I would recommend to any one
customer_reviews.author: SHARON SPENCER

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and unique
customer_reviews.text: These candlestick holders are very elegant and unique without yelling about it . I love them
customer_reviews.author: Dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Very graceful and delicate looking. Delivered as promised. Wouldn't hesitate to order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: barbara deiana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was really pleased with the candleholders. They look really modern
customer_reviews.author: Lollipop

customer_reviews.title: I liked the first pair I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first pair I purchased, so I purchased the other two sizes. They arrived packaged well and are beautiful. They look great on my mantle.
customer_reviews.author: frisk

customer_reviews.title: The candle holders are very nice, have an elegant silver finish and good weight
customer_reviews.text: The candle holders are very nice, have an elegant silver finish and good weight. I don't give them 5 stars because the velvet at the bottom of the base in one of the holders is already coming off and I just took them out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Chavez

product_meta.title: LampLust Silver Taper Candle Holders - 10.5" Tall, Modern Hourglass Shape, Easter or Spring Decorations, Fits Standard 3/4 Inch Tapered Candlesticks, Metal with Brushed Nickel Finish, Set of 2
product_meta.description:
Featuring a graceful retro silhouette and lustrous silver finish, the Eero offers a contemporary take on classic, modernist Danish design. Place this 2 pack of large candleholder on a shelf for a chic, decorative element. Suitable for indoor or outdoors, this candle set can elevate a more rustic setting. Add to a farm house style kitchen, cozy bedroom, or as part of a shabby chic mantle display in your living room. Perfect for a home accent, event centerpiece, on part of your everyday dining room decorations. Pair with our flameless LED candles for worry-free, cozy ambiance. 



Specifications:

 * Material: Nickel Plated Aluminum 
 * Finish: Silver Color, Brushed 
 * Dimensions: 2.25"D x 10.5"H 
 * Fits: 0.75"D Taper Candles 
 * Shape: Slender Hourglass 
 * Occasion: Spring Decoration / Easter / Everyday Use 
 * Intended Use: Taper Candle Stick Holder / Event Centerpiece / Mantle Display / Indoor or Outdoor 
 * Collection: Eero



What's Included?

 * (2) 10.5" Taper Candle Holders 
 * (2) Plastic Inserts (To ensure a snug fit)
feature_bullets: MODERN & CHIC : Our pair of sleek, hourglass-shaped metal candlestick holders in silver finish were inspired by Mid-Century design. Dimensions: 2.25” D by 10.5”H. | Candle Hole Size 0.75”D.

STANDARD FIT: Designed to fit any standard sized (0.75 inch) candlesticks. We recommend pairing these candle holders with LampLust's real wax flameless taper candles (sold on Amazon separately - ASIN: B0727YNMN7).
QUALITY DETAILS: Holders include velvet bases to protect your furniture and plastic ring inserts to keep your candles snug and secure.
GREAT FOR GIFTS: The set of 2 stylish holders comes in giftable packaging, perfect for a housewarming or wedding present, or as a gift for women on Mothers Day.

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: LampLust is looking for your absolute satisfaction. Our USA-based support team can be reached through seller messages or by phone. This candle holder set includes a 90 day warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
